a goal of some kind that we'd like to achieve and we're starting from some point

Fitness function that says does this change whatever the change might be move us closer to the goal or further from
the goal and if we've got a fitness function and then we start iterating we can hit the goal so any idea that
goes away from the goal we discard any idea that moves us closer to the goal we keep and we move on from there
and this works even if you move the goal even if you change the goal as long as
